sentences: Kõik head bändid esinevad just selles baaris.
Baaris on alati hea meel ja tore atmosfäär.
context: The word 'baaris' is the inessive case form of the Estonian noun 'baar', meaning 'bar'. It indicates location within or at a bar establishment. Inessive case answers the question 'kus?' (where?). The dictionary definition mentions it refers to a female server/bartender working behind the bar counter serving guests.
